title: jankaara shruthi
sahitya:
jhankAra shruti sheiguvAi jeeva viNaiyilE sangItAmrutam



peiguvAi jagadIshvaranE 



(jhankAra)







anupallavi







shankara shAmba sadAshiva Omhara shambuvena solli en janman



kaDai tEravE 



(jhankAra)







caraNam 







pala palavennum kAlai pADum puLLoshai polum pARkkaDan uLLam



innum Arkkum garjanai pOlum



malargaLai konjivarum mandamArutam pOlum madu uNDa vandinam



taLarkkum hrImkAram pOlum 



(jhankAra)
